content: ^^ Note these times are in GMT. They're also approximate :-)

/poll What quarters can you make at the WGM?
Q1 09:00-10:30 UTC (2:00-03:30 Pacific, 05:00-06:30 Eastern)
Q2 11:00-12:30 UTC (4:00-05:30 Pacific, 07:00-08:30 Eastern)
Q3 14:00-15:30 UTC (7:00-08:30 Pacific, 10:00-11:30 Eastern)
Q4 16:00-17:30 UTC (9:00-10:30 Pacific, 12:00-13:30 Eastern)
/poll What topics are you interested in discussion at WGM quarters?
